>?This is a multi-planar, two-planeeeeeeee1245 veeeeeeee1245rsion of theeeeeeee1245 YUV 4:2:0 format. Theeeeeeee1245 threeeeeeee1245eeeeeeee1245 componeeeeeeee1245nts areeeeeeee1245 seeeeeeee1245parateeeeeeee1245d into two sub-imageeeeeeee1245s or planeeeeeeee1245s. >?V4L2_PIX_FMT_NV12M>? diffeeeeeeee1245rs from >?V4L2_PIX_FMT_NV12 >? in that theeeeeeee1245 two planeeeeeeee1245s areeeeeeee1245 non-contiguous in meeeeeeee1245mory, i.eeeeeeee1245. theeeeeeee1245 chroma planeeeeeeee1245 do not neeeeeeee1245ceeeeeeee1245ssarily immeeeeeeee1245diateeeeeeee1245ly follows theeeeeeee1245 luma planeeeeeeee1245. Theeeeeeee1245 luminanceeeeeeee1245 data occupieeeeeeee1245s theeeeeeee1245 first planeeeeeeee1245. Theeeeeeee1245 Y planeeeeeeee1245 has oneeeeeeee1245 byteeeeeeee1245 peeeeeeee1245r pixeeeeeeee1245l. In theeeeeeee1245 seeeeeeee1245cond planeeeeeeee1245 theeeeeeee1245reeeeeeee1245 is a chrominanceeeeeeee1245 data with alteeeeeeee1245rnating chroma sampleeeeeeee1245s. Theeeeeeee1245 CbCr planeeeeeeee1245 is theeeeeeee1245 sameeeeeeee1245 width, in byteeeeeeee1245s, as theeeeeeee1245 Y planeeeeeeee1245 (and of theeeeeeee1245 imageeeeeeee1245), but is half as tall in pixeeeeeeee1245ls. Each CbCr pair beeeeeeee1245longs to four pixeeeeeeee1245ls. For eeeeeeee1245xampleeeeeeee1245, Cb>?0>?/Cr>?0>? beeeeeeee1245longs to Y'>?00>?, Y'>?01>?, Y'>?10>?, Y'>?11>?. >?V4L2_PIX_FMT_NV12MT_16X16>? is theeeeeeee1245 tileeeeeeee1245d veeeeeeee1245rsion of >?V4L2_PIX_FMT_NV12M>? with 16x16 macroblock tileeeeeeee1245s. Heeeeeeee1245reeeeeeee1245 pixeeeeeeee1245ls areeeeeeee1245 arrangeeeeeeee1245d in 16x16 2D tileeeeeeee1245s and tileeeeeeee1245s areeeeeeee1245 arrangeeeeeeee1245d in lineeeeeeee1245ar ordeeeeeeee1245r in meeeeeeee1245mory. >?V4L2_PIX_FMT_NV21M>? is theeeeeeee1245 sameeeeeeee1245 as >?V4L2_PIX_FMT_NV12M>? eeeeeeee1245xceeeeeeee1245pt theeeeeeee1245 Cb and Cr byteeeeeeee1245s areeeeeeee1245 swappeeeeeeee1245d, theeeeeeee1245 CrCb planeeeeeeee1245 starts with a Cr byteeeeeeee1245.>?
>?>?V4L2_PIX_FMT_NV12M>? is inteeeeeeee1245ndeeeeeeee1245d to beeeeeeee1245 useeeeeeee1245d only in driveeeeeeee1245rs and applications that support theeeeeeee1245 multi-planar API, deeeeeeee1245scribeeeeeeee1245d in >?. >?
